Nestled in a peaceful and tranquil neighborhood, this home boasts a spacious and inviting living area perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing with the family. The inviting hardwood floors and finishes give this home a contemporary feel while still providing an atmosphere of warmth and comfort.

title: Large 2 Bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment w/pvt. patio and PARKING
description:
Two bedroom, 1.5 bath apartment in the heart of the Art Museum area.  Spacious, modern apartment with private brick paved garden area and reserved parking for one car in a private courtyard.  On the first floor is a kitchen with quarry tile flooring, large dining area, powder room, huge living room with fireplace, and sliding glass doors to the patio/garden area. The first floor has hardwood floors and the stairs, upstairs hallway, and bedrooms are carpeted.  On the second floor there are two good sized bedrooms with large closets, a full size bath with linen closet, and full size washer and dryer.  Amenities include efficient heat and central air conditioning, dishwasher, garbage disposal, fireplace, full size washer and dryer, private patio and dedicated courtyard parking.  This is a very clean and well maintained apartment/property on a safe block lined with mature trees.
The property is located two blocks from the Parkway, Art Museum, and Kelly Drive, seven blocks from Whole Foods Supermarket. Public transportation via SEPTA is on the corner, and it’s a 20 minute walk to Center City.  The block is residential; it’s only one block from Fairmount Avenue and all the shops, bars, and restaurants that go with it.  On Fairmount Avenue you will find: Klein’s Market,  Garden Fresh Produce Market, CVS and Rite Aid Pharmacies, Philly Flavors Ice Cream, Little Pete’s Pizza, six bars/restaurants, Sunoco Gas station, ACE Hardware, a bookstore, Jane and John Salon, Mugshots Coffee, the Eastern State Penitentiary Historical Site, Post Office, liquor store, dry cleaners, and more.  The location is very convenient without the summertime congestion/noise of Center City.
This is a great apartment with a great landlady for a great price.
$2,150 + gas and electric.  No smoking and no pets.
Available now.

title: 4613 Woodland Ave 2 Floor
description:
Awesome, renovated 2-bedroom apartment is available now in University City/West Philadelphia. The upgrades include: hardwood floors; carpeting in both generously sized bedrooms; a cozy, common living space directly off the updated kitchen that includes modern appliances such as a dishwasher and garbage disposal; a clean, freshly painted, tiled bathroom with tub/shower; central heat and A/C; extra storage closet; remote apartment entry. Conveniently located within 5 minutes of both UPenn, Drexel, as well as many other University City/West Philadelphia attractions, the #11 and #36 trolleys both stop in front of the building for quick and easy access to Center City. The neighborhood is safe, friendly, and community oriented. The apartment is worth a look! 1st month's rent and security required. Please email with any questions or to learn of scheduled showings.

title: Sophisticated space you’ve been looking for!
description:
What luck- For the first time in years, one of only a few 900+ sq/ft lofts, in the renowned Locust Point- is available for rent! Spend this summer jogging, biking or just meandering the Schuylkill River Trail- located literal footsteps away from this unbeatable complex. A mid-rise building featuring secure fob access, leading into a newly renovated common lounge, with multiple outdoor patios, secure package room, bike parking AND fitness center! Take the elevator up to the second floor where you’ll enter your impeccably organized foyer. Hang up your day via the convenient double-wide coat closet, hooks and built-in shelving… Follow the sleek hardwood flooring, passed the stylish yet practical lower built-in shelving, into your airy open-concept living area! Notice how your kitchen with stainless appliances and granite counters is completed by a massive kitchen island- 100% open to your entire living and dining room! An over-sized living space with south-facing and panoramic windows… Living/dining/working/and recreation- a literal great room! Completed by a cozy king-sized lofted bedroom with ample closet space, PLUS a large storage locker- this is the sophisticated space you’ve been looking for!

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes!
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. title: This is the home you have been looking for!
description:
This is the home you have been looking for! Welcome to this charming, modern aesthetic 3 BR/2 BA home in the heart of the city. Centrally located between Center City and South Philadelphia, this East Passyunk gem welcomes you in with an open-concept flow and hardwood flooring. The kitchen has marble tile flooring, a white subway backsplash and quartz countertops with a newly added kitchen pantry. The family room addition was recently built in 2021 with radiant heat flooring, recess lighting, a custom granite top and Cherry wood cabinet built-in, and a sliding glass door that showcases the lush, manicured greenery that accents the newly added back patio. Beyond the patio is an added private parking space with new pavers and a custom industrial coil door with remote. The private alley way is further accented with famed artist Isaiah Zagar’s mosaic tiles, which you can enjoy from the patio, the newly added rooftop deck, and the family room. There are two bedrooms on the second floor with a full bathroom. One of the bedrooms has direct access to the rooftop deck, complete with a spiral staircase down to the first floor patio. The third floor has a loft area with natural light from a skylight and window, perfect for a home office or reading nook. The master suite is also on the third floor with high, pitched ceilings, exposed brick wall accents, and an ensuite bathroom with a double vanity, marble tile, and roomy walk-in shower. There is also a whole house humidifier for those dry colder nights. If you are looking for a cozy, private, but city-centric home, then this is the one. Located a block from Broad Street, and two blocks from Washington Ave, this home is in walking distance to markets, shopping, restaurants, and city nightlife. Welcome home! Renter are offering a one-year home warranty from AHS with the Rent.

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums.
